verses.verse: Thou <WG4771> Therefore, <WG3767> <WG5043> My Child, <WG3450> Be Strong <WG1743> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

No One <WG3762> Serving As A Soldier <WG4754> Entangles Himself <WG1707> With The <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Life <WG979> Affairs, <WG4230> That <WG2443> Him Who <WG3588> Enrolled Him As A Soldier <WG4758> He May Please. <WG700>
<WG1437> And If <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Contend In The Games <WG118> Anyone, <WG5100> <WG3756> He Is Not Crowned <WG4737> <WG1437> Unless <WG3361> Lawfully <WG3545> He Shall Have Contended. <WG118>

Faithful <WG4103> Is The <WG3588> Word; <WG3056> <WG1487> For If <WG1063> We Died Together With Him, <WG4880> Also <WG2532> We Shall Live Together; <WG4800>
If <WG1487> We Endure, <WG5278> Also <WG2532> We Shall Reign Together; <WG4821> If <WG1487> , We Deny <WG720> Him, He Also <WG2548> Will Deny <WG720> Us; <WG2248>
If <WG1487> We Are Unfaithful, <WG569> He <WG1565> Faithful <WG4103> Abides; <WG3306> To Deny <WG720> Himself <WG1438> <WG3756> He Is Not Able. <WG1410>

<WG3588> <WG1161> But Profane <WG952> Empty Babblings <WG2757> Stand Aloof From, <WG4026> To <WG1909> More <WG4119> For <WG1063> They Will Advance <WG4298> Of Ungodliness, <WG763>
And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3056> Their Word <WG846> As <WG5613> A Gangrene <WG1044> Pasture <WG3542> Will Have; <WG2192> Of Whom <WG3739> Is <WG2076> Hymenaeus <WG5211> And <WG2532> Philetus; <WG5372>

<WG3588> Nevertheless <WG3305> Firm <WG4731> Foundation <WG2310> <WG3588> God's <WG2316> <WG2476> <WG2476> Having <WG2192> <WG3588> <WG4973> This Seal, <WG3778> Knows <WG1097> The Lord <WG2962> Those That <WG3588> Are <WG5607> His, <WG846> And <WG2532> Let Depart <WG868> From <WG575> Unrighteousness <WG93> Everyone <WG3956> Who <WG3588> Names <WG3687> The <WG3588> Name <WG3686> Of Christ. <WG5547>

<WG1401> And A Bondman <WG1161> Of The Lord <WG2962> <WG3756> It Behooves Not <WG1163> To Contend, <WG3164> ' But <WG235> Gentle <WG2261> To Be <WG1511> Towards <WG4314> All; <WG3956> Apt To Teach; <WG1317> Forbearing; <WG420>
